flawed_nl_solution:
Each tree produces 60*0.5=<<60*0.5=30>>30 more lemons than normal
So they each produce 60+30=<<60+30=90>>90 lemons
He has 50*30=<<50*30=5100>>5100 trees
So every year he produces 5100*90=<<5100*90=459000>>459000 lemons
That means he produces 459000*5=<<459000*5=2295000>>2295000
#### 2295000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1500, not 5100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
